\subsection{Function Documentation}
\hypertarget{readsums_8c_a6e8f056a53536d0283dcab99626d686f}{}\index{readsums.\+c@{readsums.\+c}!rs\+\_\+loadsig\+\_\+begin@{rs\+\_\+loadsig\+\_\+begin}}
\index{rs\+\_\+loadsig\+\_\+begin@{rs\+\_\+loadsig\+\_\+begin}!readsums.\+c@{readsums.\+c}}
\subsubsection[{rs\+\_\+loadsig\+\_\+begin(rs\+\_\+signature\+\_\+t $\ast$$\ast$signature)}]{\setlength{\rightskip}{0pt plus 5cm}{\bf rs\+\_\+job\+\_\+t}$\ast$ rs\+\_\+loadsig\+\_\+begin (
\begin{DoxyParamCaption}
\item[{{\bf rs\+\_\+signature\+\_\+t} $\ast$$\ast$}]{signature}
\end{DoxyParamCaption}
)}\label{readsums_8c_a6e8f056a53536d0283dcab99626d686f}


Read a signature from a file into an \hyperlink{librsync_8h_afb2a9cb505daeb8e519d06686f5caabf}{rs\+\_\+signature\+\_\+t} structure in memory. 

Once there, it can be used to generate a delta to a newer version of the file.

\begin{DoxyNote}{Note}
After loading the signatures, you must call \hyperlink{librsync_8h_a1c5553b7439b942d0dad35c8230e7217}{rs\+\_\+build\+\_\+hash\+\_\+table()} before you can use them. 
\end{DoxyNote}


Definition at line 204 of file readsums.\+c.
